ygData.subject: Ice comet & research
ygData.msgSnippet: Finaly is resolved some of our problems !! 1. Ice comet components is now a quest items, you have a complicated quest wich you get in everfrost and so it is
ygData.messageBody:
Finaly is resolved some of our problems !!

1. Ice comet components is now a quest items, you have a complicated quest
wich you get in everfrost and so it is easier to get your hands on (before
it was nearly imposible)

2. For all of us wich like research there is in gypsy camp a girl wich like
to colect all shiny things and if you make a visit to wisp isle and then to
her you can get realy much runes and books :)

3.) there is also some other adjustments in portal spells radius and also
in damage done by lv 44 - 49 spels wich afect us but i dont have info on them.

Silverion Dragonirder

High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
Fenin Ro

http://www.tip.it/wizard
